oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Nawādir al-zamān fi waqāʼiʻ Jabal Lubnān / taʼlīf Iskandar Afandī Abkāriyūs : manuscript, 1877?
Nawādir al-zamān
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abkāriyūs, Iskandar ibn Yaʻqūb , -1885
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Text is a history of Lebanon in the early 20 century.
Written in one column, 14 lines per page, in black.
On inside front cover : "Presented to Isaac H. Hall by the author and transcriber, Alexander Effendi Abkarius, Beirut, 19 Nisan 1877" [April 19, 1877].
Book of the marvels of time in the events of Mount. Lebanon.
MS Arab 8. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dayr al Qamar, Lebanon, Massacre of, 1860
